channel.title: Will take any Kaiju drop.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Will take any Kaiju drop." - Looking for any kaiju drop for a none Kaiju item/items. Will try and get anything you want.

item.title: Will take any Kaiju drop.
item.content:encoded:
Ill trade any of these for a kaiju drop I can get some goo's if wanted or anything else Non Kaiju. Can get more of most these items.
Gold Potion-1
Super Potion-1
Reversing Hourglass-3
Rotating Timephere-1
Yoma Blood-2
Monochrome pheromone-6
CRW-3
Tell me what combo and il trade it for any kaiju drop. Dont care how bad any.
